title: Wich server do i need to use?
body: I changed from server and i dont know wich one suits me best here.. i have lag and i live in Sarasota, can someone help me please?

replies.body:
If you're in Florida, you should have no issues playing on NA. If you're seeing issues with your latency (ping) then you may be running some incompatible network settings. Working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will help ensure everything locally is A-Okay.

Please let me know if this caused any changes for ya.
